title: Explain why stratified sampling is preferable

content.question: Under which of the following conditions is it preferable to use stratified random sampling rather than simple random sampling?

choices.label: The population can be divided into a large number of strata so that each stratum contains only a few individuals.
The population can be divided into a small number of strata so that each stratum contains a large number of individuals.
The population can be divided into strata so that the individuals in each stratum are as much alike as possible.
The population can be divided into strata so that the individuals in each stratum are as different as possible.
The population can be divided into strata of equal sizes so that each individual in the population still has the same chance of being selected.

content.answer: The population can be divided into strata so that the individuals in each stratum are as much alike as possible.
